summary: Completed comprehensive testing of three NEW features from review request. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate - 25/25 tests). Frontend features fully functional including shipments inscan date/time with date range filter, pickups page with 4 tabs including Unsubmitted Items, and new Champ Delivery View with delivery action capabilities.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (25/25 tests passed - 100% success rate)
NEW FEATURE 1: Shipments page 'Inscan Date/Time' column header present
NEW FEATURE 1: Date range filter inputs (From/To) working correctly
NEW FEATURE 1: Date range filtering functionality operational
NEW FEATURE 1: GET /api/shipments with inscan_date_from and inscan_date_to parameters working
NEW FEATURE 2: Pickups page has 4 tabs (Seller Pickups, Unsubmitted Items, Customer Returns, Personal Shopping)
NEW FEATURE 2: Unsubmitted Items tab fully functional in both filter and create dialog
NEW FEATURE 2: POST /api/pickups/unsubmitted-items endpoint working (created pickup successfully)
NEW FEATURE 2: Unsubmitted Items form has same fields as Seller Pickup (categories & quantities)
NEW FEATURE 2: Unsubmitted Items pickup creation with success message
NEW FEATURE 3: Champ Delivery View page (/champ-view) loads correctly
NEW FEATURE 3: Champ selection dropdown with 6 available champs
NEW FEATURE 3: GET /api/champ/{id}/shipments endpoint working
NEW FEATURE 3: POST /api/champ/delivery-action endpoint working with proof (delivered status)
NEW FEATURE 3: Delivery proof recording (image, GPS coordinates, notes)
NEW FEATURE 3: Assigned Pickups section showing 3 pickups for selected champ
Complete with Proof buttons available for assigned pickups
Complete with Proof dialog with image upload, GPS capture, notes fields
Navigation between all pages working correctly
All existing functionality preserved (shipments, logistics, dashboard)
Backend fixed: run_sheet_id handling for direct deliveries
Dashboard pickup statistics showing unsubmitted_items type correctly
